comment.author: 65005004@N02
comment._content: This soldier was my great grandfather's half brother.  HIs full name was Oneziphrus Swepson A. Brock.  Born April 19, 1843 in Lynnhaven, Princess Anne County, VA.  His father was Ransom Brock and mother was Jacomine Methusa Brown, who are buried in the Alanton section of Virginia Beach.  I have his mother's prayer book in my possession.  Hand written inside left front cover: Jacamine Brock's book July 6, 1862  "O my heart is sad and I am all alone. O shall I ever see this war ended shall ever see my boys again.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Thanks for adding that.  I guess she was one of the lucky mothers who did see her boys again.
